text: Na'ankure Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzana Israeli vahe Anumzamo'a amanage hu'ne, Kagrama ofri kasefa'ma hunka manisana kna'afina mani'nenka kavufinti negesanke'na, ama mopamofo agu'afima mani'neza muse zagame'ma nehu'za ki'za zokago'ma nehaza avu'ava zana Nagra eri fanane nehu'na, aravema nehazage'za musenkasema nehaza zamagasasanena eri atregahue.
